storyInfo: Bagpipe heads for the streets to continue her investigation, discovering that the fault line between the local Tarans and the barracks runs deep. Horn struggles for and gains an opportunity to meet with the barracks' colonel.

attributes.text: 'As the wind combs through golden wheat,'
'The forest wild wi' pipes of steel clank and beat,'
'I found by the edge of a plate my dear love true, and following a firelight straight from the blue...'

attributes.content: So that's how the second half of the song goes...
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: How sad.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Now Damian's gone, and he won't even get a decent burial...
attributes.name: Sorrowful Woman

attributes.content: They'd never give him back to us. All they'd do is scorch him to ash, scatter him off the city, treat him like the dirt under anyone's foot.
attributes.name: Embittered Man

attributes.content: (Soft sobbing)
attributes.name: Sorrowful Woman

attributes.content: First it was Lowry, then it was Chris, and now they've caught hold of Damian too. Grainne, when Sean got arrested, they all said he'd caught Oripathy—
attributes.name: Embittered Man

attributes.content: No, Ronan, don't go on. Sean... he just caught it being careless.
attributes.name: Sorrowful Woman

attributes.content: He was a hardworking, loyal man. A poor, poor man, and the only thing he ever wanted was just a better life for me and my son...
attributes.name: Sorrowful Woman

attributes.content: Grainne, haven't you figured it out?
attributes.name: Embittered Man

attributes.content: We're just a bunch of rivets to them. Of course they'll toss us away without a care when we rust.
attributes.name: Embittered Man

attributes.content: And even if we haven't rusted, so long as we don't fit too well in the city's machines, we've got the same fate coming. Nothing changes.
attributes.name: Embittered Man

attributes.content: They never gave a shit we were catching Oripathy one by one.
attributes.name: Embittered Man

attributes.content: Every month they give out those drugs, the other workers get their whole lot, and we can only expect a half. Maybe even a third.
attributes.name: Embittered Man

attributes.content: And the protective suits. How long has Sean been wearing his for? Five years? Bloody hell, seven? How many times have you snuck out of bed at night just to patch it up?
attributes.name: Embittered Man

attributes.content: All those laws, all those standards, just for their benefit. And us?
attributes.name: Embittered Man

attributes.content: We're only fit to eat the potatoes and the rotten apples they don't want. Means nothing that the ag plates of this city soak in our sweat.
attributes.name: Embittered Man

attributes.content: We're only fit to waste away our lives day and night in the factories, and once we can't work a day more, we fall ill one by one just like they wanted!
attributes.name: Embittered Man

attributes.content: The way this is going, it's like they're sitting there playing dominoes, wiping us Tarans off our own city—
attributes.name: Embittered Man

attributes.content: Stop it... I'm begging you. Ronan, nothing you're saying will lead to any good.
attributes.name: Sorrowful Woman

attributes.content: Just look at Cliodhna and her kin stood over there. Crying over their own son, their own brother. How many more loves do you want lost, how many more hurting over what your anger did for them?
attributes.name: Sorrowful Woman

attributes.content: It's the murderers that brought this hurt. They're killing us one after another. Times it's with sickness, times it's with mortar shells. Grainne, don't you deceive yourself any longer.
attributes.name: Embittered Man

attributes.content: (Low voice) This morning, a few came looking for me. The O'Briens, and Conor's brother. They've decided to join us.
attributes.name: Embittered Man

attributes.content: It's been hard getting by for you and your kid, we understand. This is a big moment, and we need to help each other now more than ever...
attributes.name: Embittered Man

attributes.content: You'd better keep far from me and my child, Ronan... seeing as my Sean got on well enough with your lot.
attributes.name: Sorrowful Woman

attributes.content: I have to go, Grainne. You see that one over there? She's wearing that uniform.
attributes.name: Embittered Man

attributes.content: You know our rules. I trust in you, and I'm asking you to trust me more. If you've made up your mind, you can tell Saoirse.
attributes.name: Embittered Man

attributes.content: Hello!
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Er... hello.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Do you know Barry's, er, Damian Barry's family?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: (Shakes head)
attributes.name: Sorrowful Woman

attributes.content: I heard you singin' just now. I'm not in the wrong place.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: I... I don't know what you're searching about for, but Damian's ma and sister know nothing.
attributes.name: Sorrowful Woman

attributes.content: Then did he have any especially good friends, or anyone who worked at the warehouse with him?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: We know nothing... That's the truth...
attributes.name: Sorrowful Woman

attributes.content: *Whimper*... I'm begging you! Please don't take me...
attributes.name: Sorrowful Woman

attributes.content: Huh? Sorry... did I get too close? I've got no intentions of hurtin' you.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: You seem awful scared of me. Is somethin' on my face?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: N... Nothing at all...
attributes.name: Sorrowful Woman

attributes.content: If you'll allow me, I need to go home. I still have so much fruit from this morning, and it'll go rotten in no time, if I leave it alone...
attributes.name: Sorrowful Woman

attributes.content: *Sigh*.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Eh? Is that... Captain Kelly?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Cliodhna, I just want to see you for one moment. I want to know if you and Fiona are still alright...
attributes.name: Captain Kelly

attributes.content: Yes, it was my mistake, but—
attributes.name: Captain Kelly

attributes.content: My hands were tied...
attributes.name: Captain Kelly

attributes.content: Of course I remember, I remember it all. Damian... he was the boy of my sister.
attributes.name: Captain Kelly

attributes.content: I watched him grow up his whole life. The day I was transferred back from Peninsula to Hillock, he set an edelweiss in my cap with his own two hands.
attributes.name: Captain Kelly

attributes.content: He was still so little then... I...
attributes.name: Captain Kelly

attributes.content: I'm sorry... I shouldn't be telling you all this.
attributes.name: Captain Kelly

attributes.content: You're right... I've been good for nothing. I haven't the face to return here.
attributes.name: Captain Kelly

attributes.content: I wasn't in time to stop him when he got involved with that group... and I couldn't disobey the Colonel's orders.
attributes.name: Captain Kelly

attributes.content: Not just that, I have to do this. This is all for County Hillock.
attributes.name: Captain Kelly

attributes.content: I love you all, and I love this city... I can't just stand goggling while that bunch tear our home to pieces.
attributes.name: Captain Kelly

attributes.content: I understand, Cliodhna, my sister, and I'm not asking your forgiveness or anything.
attributes.name: Captain Kelly

attributes.content: I'll... be going, then. You... you and Fiona be sure to take care of yourselves.
attributes.name: Captain Kelly

attributes.content: If I can find the time tomorrow, I'll come see you again...
attributes.name: Captain Kelly

attributes.content: *Cough*, *cough* *cough*...
attributes.name: Captain Kelly

attributes.content: What are you—
attributes.name: Captain Kelly

attributes.content: Oh, just... just a boy.
attributes.name: Captain Kelly

attributes.content: Are you... *cough* *cough*—are you hurt? Don't run too fast now. It's been decades, and they've still never levelled the road here...
attributes.name: Captain Kelly

attributes.content: Traitor!
attributes.name: Craig

attributes.content: Wh—What did you say?
attributes.name: Captain Kelly

attributes.content: Traitor!!!
attributes.name: Craig

attributes.content: Craig! What are you doing?! Get back here now!
attributes.name: Sorrowful Woman

attributes.content: And what's that ball in your hands for... oh, forget it, you're always gripping that ball wherever you go. Were you off looking for Conor's brother again? Oh, you... Ronan's told you, hasn't he?
attributes.name: Sorrowful Woman

attributes.content: Look at your hands, all covered in black. It's like you were digging through a mine.
attributes.name: Sorrowful Woman

attributes.content: You come with me to the morning market from now on. You can't go looking for them around this time anymore... I can't let you become like them...
attributes.name: Sorrowful Woman

attributes.content: Traitor?
attributes.name: Captain Kelly

attributes.content: Boy... wasn't one bit wrong.
attributes.name: Captain Kelly

attributes.content: The Captain stands still for a moment, repeating the word, once, twice to himself, finally turning to leave.
His head is hung low as could be, and he doesn't meet the gaze of a single person more, including those young colleagues of him that rush his way.
Hold on a moment, Captain...
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: You—What are you all doing here? Pack off home, if you know what's good for you!
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: We've told you, you're not allowed to congregate on the streets at this time!
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: This is our home! It's not us who should go packing!
attributes.name: Embittered Man

attributes.content: —Who had the lip to say that just now?
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: What are these... Wilted leaves?
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: Step forward right now!
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: You Tara rabble, watch I don't—
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: Brandishin' a bolt on the street's far too dangerous!
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Who're you?
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: Ah, I'm here on orders. Come to investigate the case.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: You're here for the murder at the bar?
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: Er, what murder?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: This rabble right here. They've killed plenty of ours.
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: ...Damian Barry?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Right, I hear he's been put to death already. I suppose it was you lot who caught him? Nicely done, thank you.
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: We didn't know yet when we caught him... was he really part of the spectre force? Er...
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Who gives a shake what he was? Serves him right he's dead!
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: Did you hear me? No—congregating! Each and all of you up to whatever secret business here, you'll all be treated as suspects!
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: You bloody Tara arselickers—
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: Don't! Don't get carried away! Look, most of 'em are just plain city folk, with a loved one dead, and they're here grievin' for him, like human nature would.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Uh—a—a rotten potato?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Ha ha, see? You spoke for them, and you got battered, right?
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: If you're so keen on staying here, stay. As long as I make sure this rabble behaves itself, I'm done. My rotten luck for getting this patrol duty.
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: You riff-raff, I'll say it again, no congregating!!
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: Oh, it's just more and more rottin' leaves...
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Come this way.
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: Eh, what?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: 'Reporting in, 9th Defence attacked...'
'Reporting in, 13th Defence currently in firefight...'
Send notice one more time, please. I want to see Colonel Hamilton.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: The Colonel's handling urgent affairs.
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: You said that two hours ago.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: I've already abided by strict process. I submitted description of my duty yesterday when entering County Hillock.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: If the Colonel won't let us take part in suspect interrogations, and goes to lengths to execute them beforehand, and presently refuses my request to meet him—
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: To anyone else, don't you think this conduct might be taken as a deliberate hindrance to our fulfillment of orders?
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: I have no authority to answer your question, Lieutenant.
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: That's fine. I'll say my part, and it's enough if someone listens.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: I've said before, the Originium products thieved are not small in number. It's sufficient arms to allow a detachment to attack a small town, or bomb a medium nomadic city's support tracks.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Who'd want to obtain these products?
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Ordinary bandits wouldn't need them; it'd cost too much to smuggle them out. With Victorian military goods in this great a bulk, even a Sargon black market under Columbia's protection wouldn't dare provide a means for a deal.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Who else is left? A local private arms dealer, moneymaking off the costs of remodeling? They haven't got the appetite, let alone the guts.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Only a well-trained unit, well-versed in military methods would dare take it, and could evade our spies on top.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: If this unit got hold of that large a quantity of Originium product, what would their goal be?
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Conspiracy to overthrow? Taking the chance to embezzle far removed from Londinium, colluding with outside powers to fill their pockets, slowly and steadily?
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Lieutenant...
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: No need to panic, this is all just baseless reasoning, no thanks to whoever's keeping me waiting. I can't get anything done like this.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: (Subdued communications)
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: Lieutenant, the Colonel says he'll be here imminently.
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier
